title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Clearly outline the purpose, features, and technical requirements of the VirtualNetworkOptimizer project.

title: Design AI Algorithm for Network Optimization
description: Develop an AI algorithm that can analyze network configurations and suggest optimizations.

title: Develop Network Performance Monitoring System
description: Create a system to monitor network performance metrics for optimization purposes.

title: Create User Interface for Network Optimization Tool
description: Design and develop an intuitive user interface for configuring network settings and viewing optimization suggestions.

title: Integrate AI Algorithm with Network Monitoring System
description: Combine the developed AI algorithm with the network monitoring system for continuous optimization.
dependencies: Design AI Algorithm for Network Optimization

title: Perform Initial Testing and Validation of VirtualNetworkOptimizer
description: Execute preliminary testing to ensure the system performs as intended.
dependencies: Create User Interface for Network Optimization Tool
Integrate AI Algorithm with Network Monitoring System

title: Review and Refine VirtualNetworkOptimizer Design
description: Review the design documents and refine as needed based on testing results.
dependencies: Perform Initial Testing and Validation of VirtualNetworkOptimizer

title: Iterate on AI Algorithm and Network Monitoring System
description: Iterate on the AI algorithm and network monitoring system based on testing results.

title: Perform Detailed Testing of VirtualNetworkOptimizer
description: Execute detailed testing to ensure the system operates efficiently and effectively.
dependencies: Iterate on AI Algorithm and Network Monitoring System

title: Prepare Documentation for VirtualNetworkOptimizer
description: Create user manuals, technical documentation, and any other necessary materials.
